title: VOICES OF BATTLE : PACK 1
description: “Unleash the Voice of War - Battle Sounds Redefined”
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Introducing “Voices Of Battle: Pack 1”, the ultimate vocal sound pack designed to bring your game’s combat scenes to life. This pack captures the FIGHER'S raw emotion and intensity, providing an immersive audio experience for players.


Folder Categories:


ANGER: Fierce roars and shouts that embody the rage of combat.

EXHAUSTED: Breathy gasps and weary groans depicting the toll of battle.

FIGHT: Dynamic grunts and impacts from blows and strikes.

GRAPPLE: Strained vocalizations of close-quarters struggle.

LITTLE PAIN: Sharp cries of sudden, sharp pain.

SEVERE PAIN: Deep, guttural moans of critical injury.

RUNNING: Quick, rhythmic breaths of hasty movement.

SOBBING: Soft whimpers and sobs of defeat or loss.

TERRIFIED: Panic-stricken yells and fearful shouts.


Use Cases:


AAA Titles: Elevate your blockbuster games with high-quality, cinematic soundscapes.

RPGs: Enhance character interactions with expressive audio that reacts to player choices.

Action Games: Amplify the thrill with impactful sounds for every punch and kick.

Indie Games: Add depth to your indie project with professional-grade audio.

Mobile Games: Keep players engaged with responsive and emotive sound effects.

Each sound is crafted to fit seamlessly into various game types, from high-stakes AAA productions to immersive RPGs and fast-paced action games. Whether it’s the heat of battle or the aftermath of a skirmish, these sounds add a layer of realism that can make or break the player’s experience.


Technical Specifications:


High-Quality WAV Files: Ensuring compatibility and ease of implementation.

Multi-Platform Support: Ready for use in any game engine or audio middleware.

Royalty-Free: Use them in all of your projects without any additional fees.

Character Vocal Expressions: The pack features a single character’s vocal expressions, allowing for a consistent and character-specific audio narrative. This makes it ideal for games with a strong central protagonist or for creating a unique enemy type with its own set of vocal cues.
technicalDetails:
Features: 

Sounds Are Organized Into The Following Folders:

Anger

Exhausted

Fight

Grapple

Little_Pain

Running

Severe_Pain

Sobbing

Terrified


Number of Audio Waves: 245

Number of Audio Cues: 245

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 6:48

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
